title: User Document Schema
description: Schema for user documents in Firestore for ClassLink

academic_status.description: User's academic status (e.g., Undergraduate, Graduate, Alumni)

created_time.description: Timestamp when the user account was created

major.description: User's field of study or major

photo_url.description: URL to the user's profile picture

tutor_interest.description: Indicates if the user is interested in being a tutor
